com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport.filter
Class FilterChain

java.lang.Object
  com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport.filter.FilterChain

public class FilterChain
extends java.lang.Object

A container of Filters that forwards Handler events to the consisting filters and terminal Handler sequentially.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
DengTao

Constructor Detail

FilterChain

public FilterChain()
Create a new default chain, associated with a session. It will only contain a HeadFilter and a TailFilter.

fireSessionCreated

public void fireSessionCreated(Session session)
Fires a Handler.sessionCreated(Session) event. Most users don't need to call this method at all. Please use this method only when you implement a new transport or fire a virtual event.

Parameters:
session - created session
Since:
1.0

fireSessionIdle

public void fireSessionIdle(Session session,
                            IdleStatus status)
Fires a Handler.sessionIdle(Session, IdleStatus) event. Most users don't need to call this method at all. Please use this method only when you implement a new transport or fire a virtual event.

Parameters:
session - idle session
status - idle status IdleStatus.READ_IDLE or IdleStatus.WRITE_IDLE
Since:
1.0

Parameters:
session - to be closed
Since:

fireExceptionCaught

public void fireExceptionCaught(Session session,
                                java.lang.Throwable cause)
Fires a Handler.exceptionCaught(Session, Throwable) event. Most users don't need to call this method at all. Please use this method only when you implement a new transport or fire a virtual event.

Parameters:
session - the session whitch exception happened!
cause - The exception cause

fireDataReceived

public void fireDataReceived(Session session,
                             java.lang.Object data)

Parameters:
data - The received data
